title: How to design a positive online experience for the Deaf community and people with hearing loss | Torchbox

metadata.description: In our latest blog, Millie draws on her experiences learning the expressive language of BSL, conversations with members of the Deaf community, and accessibility testing that we have conducted at Torchbox. She explores the ways organisations can create a positive web experience for this user-base.
